Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4747 BETHESDA AVENUE,SUITE 1300, BETHESDA, Maryland, 20814, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Host Hotels & Resorts owns 81 predominantly urban and resort upper-upscale and luxury hotel properties representing over 45,000 rooms, mainly in the United States. Host recently sold off the company's interests in a joint venture owning a portfolio of hotels throughout Europe and also sold other joint ventures that owned properties in Asia and the United States. The majority of Host's portfolio operates under the Marriott and Starwood brands.
